name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Howard GIBSON, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Howard GIBSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order of the Superior Court affirmed, 271 Pa.Super. 499, 414 A.2d 364.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Burton A. Rose, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
455 A.2d 634
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Howard GIBSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1983.
Decided Feb. 1, 1983.
Burton A. Rose, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
